workExp.description: Learnt web development languages like html5, css3 in depth. Built various websites during the learning process.
Built bank website to perform money transactions. Used HTML5, CSS3 and PHP to design website and perform various transactions between bank accounts.

Developed landing pages and web applications using Reactjs and Nextjs Maintained quality assurance through code testing and cross-browser testing. Adhered to best practices for software development methodology and web security.
